name: Water Mother (Itelmen)
shortLoreBlurb: Water Mother (Itelmen) is a deity/spirit from Kamchatka associated with sea, salmon, fertility. Stories warn that respect for waters and their spirits is essential.

description: Water Mother (Itelmen) is a deity/spirit from Kamchatka associated with sea, salmon, fertility. Stories warn that respect for waters and their spirits is essential.
